meanings.definition: The action of inventing or creating something new.
meanings.sent1: Her invention of a new game brought joy to her friends.
meanings.sent2: The invention of the light bulb revolutionized the way we live.
meanings.sent3: His invention of a robot to do homework was both clever and funny.
meanings.sent4: The invention of the wheel paved the way for modern transportation.
meanings.sent5: The young inventor's creation won first place at the science fair.

meanings.definition: A new device, method, or process developed through study and experimentation.
meanings.sent1: The latest invention in technology is a smartwatch.
meanings.sent2: The invention of the telephone changed communication forever.
meanings.sent3: The invention of a machine to walk dogs automatically was a hit.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an invention that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The invention of the printing press transformed the spread of knowledge.
